short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search and import free SVG files directly to Canva

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SVG Search and Import for Canva is a powerful extension that lets you discover and instantly import SVG files into your Canva designs. Browse through a vast collection of SVG graphics and icons, and add them to your projects with just one click.

Key Features:

Instant SVG search with real-time results
One-click import directly into Canva
Color detection and automatic optimization
Support for both Canva editor and home page
Automatic color reduction for Canva compatibility
Preview SVGs before importing
Shows number of colors in each SVG

How it works:

Open Canva in your browser
Click the extension icon to open the side panel
Search for SVGs using keywords
Preview and select your desired SVG
Click to instantly import into your Canva design

Perfect for:

Designers looking to enhance their Canva projects
Content creators needing quick access to SVG graphics
Marketing professionals creating branded content
Anyone working with Canva who needs SVG assets

Technical Details:

Works with Canva's free and pro accounts
Automatically optimizes SVGs for Canva compatibility
Reduces complex SVGs to 5 colors maximum
Maintains vector quality during import
Compatible with all modern browsers
